title: A resolution of two cases of conscience in two discourses : the first, Of the lawfulness of compliance with all the ceremonies of the Church of England : the second, Of the necessity of the use of common-prayer in publick.
author: Francklin, John, d. 1689.
notes: Attributed by John Francklin. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
